about_the_game:
Undetake and adventure with the Dryad! Play as the Wisp, a bubbly blue ball accompanying the Dryad in a new and frightening world! Thankfully the Dryad has restorative powers that will help you endure all kinds of horrible pain.

  • Island-building and plant management
  • Over eight chapters with different themes and mechanics
  • Worldly awesome music
  • NPCs who don't say a thing and only communicate via physical contact
  • A ghastly fog we call miasma which will consume you

Full Game will have the following chapters:
P, A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I

Demo will have the following chapters available:
P, A, D
detailed_description:
Undetake and adventure with the Dryad! Play as the Wisp, a bubbly blue ball accompanying the Dryad in a new and frightening world! Thankfully the Dryad has restorative powers that will help you endure all kinds of horrible pain.

  • Over eight chapters with different themes and mechanics

  • A ghastly fog we call miasma which will consume you

Full Game will have the following chapters:

Demo will have the following chapters available:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
